description.value: Everyone with a Psy Rating within Willpower Bonus metres of the Untouchable reduces their base Psy Rating by 1 whilst within range. If this results in them having Psy Rating 0, they cannot use Psychic Powers.

system.benefit: Everyone with a Psy Rating within Willpower Bonus metres of the Untouchable reduces their base Psy Rating by 1 whilst within range. If this results in them having Psy Rating 0, they cannot use Psychic Powers.
